headline: Hertz, UiPath & Nvidia, EchoStar and Verizon: Trending Tickers
summary: Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman tracks several of the day's top trending stock tickers, including rental car company Hertz (HTZ) launching an online car-selling platform, UiPath (PATH) partnering with Nvidia (NVDA) and OpenAI (OPAI.PVT), and Bloomberg reporting illustrating that EchoStar (SATS) is considering selling its spectrum licenses to Verizon (VZ). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: EchoStar Shares Jump on Talks to Sell Spectrum to Verizon
summary: The talks involve EchoStar’s AWS-3 licenses, valuable for carrying 5G wireless signals, according to people familiar with the situation, who asked to not be identified because the discussions are private.  EchoStar put a carrying value of $9.8 billion on the spectrum, according to a regulatory filing.
